availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James B. Crutcher (Union County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Crutcher and Hannah Crutcher. Married to Susan Wootton Crutcher in Spencer County on December 29, 1853. Father of John E. Crutcher, Maria Crutcher, Elizabeth C. Crutcher, William P. Crutcher. Farmer in Spencer County in 1850. Farmer in Union County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Spencer County, District 2, p. 104B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 521.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Spencer County Marriages, Film #000482494.
